content: Hello Jeyachandran! Nice to meet you. Can you tell me a little bit about your background and what motivated you to apply for this position?

It seems like you're a bit shy! That's okay, I'm here to learn more about you and your skills.

Let's get started with some technical questions. Can you tell me about your experience with machine learning and deep learning? You've listed "Machine Learning" and "Deep Learning" under your skills, but could you give me an example of a project you've worked on that utilizes these techniques?

Don't worry, it seems like you're getting comfortable! Can you tell me more about your AI project developer role at SHINE LOGICS? What specific responsibilities did you have in this role, and what did you achieve during your time there?

So, during your time as an AI Project Developer at SHINE LOGICS, you developed an AI chatbot with real-time database integration and implemented voice automation for an e-commerce website. That sounds like an exciting project!

Can you elaborate on how you handled the real-time database integration part of the project? What technologies did you use for this, and were there any specific challenges you faced during the development process?
